location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 110 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor for the Public Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter records the arrival (and subsequent departure to India) of the IntrepidSnow, commanded by Captain Joseph Alderson. The letter also discusses finanical matters and states that monthly accounts for April and May are enclosed as well as general books from May 1785 to April 1786 (these are not contained in the file). It is noted that the books report a loss. It is also noted that troubles in the interior of Persia continue and this has affected trade from Bushire. The outstanding debt owed to the Resident (by the Company) is noted.
